T02D3490:139b-1: badzra t'a r'a s'a dha nam /
T02D3490:139b-3: rdo rje sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs /
T02D3490:139b-4: 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3490:139b-5: phun sum tshogs pa kun 'phel ba'i //
T02D3490:139b-6: sgrol ma la ni gus phyag 'tshal //
T02D3490:139b-7: man ngag ji bzhin bsdus nas ni //
T02D3490:139b-8: de yi sgrub thabs bri bar bya //
T02D3490:139b-9: dang por re zhig rnal 'byor pas /
T02D3490:139b-10: me tog shin tu dri zhim po la sogs pa
T02D3490:139b-11: yid du 'ong ba'i bsam gtan gyi khang pa la
T02D3490:139b-12: sogs par zhugs nas stan bde ba la rdo rje
T02D3490:139b-14: rang gi snying gar t'am yig yongs su gyur pa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor //
T02D3490:139b-15: de'i steng du t'am yig ser po las rdo rje'o //
T02D3490:139b-16: de'i 'od zer gyis nam mkha'i phyogs su bcom ldan
T02D3490:139b-17: 'das ma'i 'khor lo blta zhing gdan drangs nas mngon
T02D3490:140a-0: du byas te / rang gi snying ga'i sa bon las byung ba'i me tog ma @140a * //
T02D3490:140a-1: la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams spros te /
T02D3490:140a-2: me tog la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod par bya'o //
T02D3490:140a-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das ma'i 'khor lo de'i mdun du sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa bya'o //
T02D3490:140a-4: sdig pa thams cad bdag gis so sor bshags so //
T02D3490:140a-5: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang 'phags pa
T02D3490:140a-6: so so'i skye bo thams cad kyi dge ba thams
T02D3490:140a-7: cad la rjes su yi rang ngo //
T02D3490:140a-8: bdag gis dge ba thams cad ni bla na med
T02D3490:140a-9: pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su yongs
T02D3490:140a-11: 'dir bdag byang chub ma thob kyi bar du rkang
T02D3490:140a-12: gnyis rnams kyi mchog sangs rgyas la skyabs su mchi'o
T02D3490:140a-13: // yang dag pa'i chos rnams kyi mchog theg pa chen po'i chos la skyabs su mchi'o //
T02D3490:140a-14: tshogs rnams kyi mchog byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa'i tshogs la skyabs su mchi'o //
T02D3490:140a-15: kye ma bdag bla na med pa yang dag par
T02D3490:140a-16: rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs
T02D3490:140a-17: rgyas nas sems can gyi don dang phan pa dang
T02D3490:140a-18: / bde ba'i phyir ji srid shin tu mi gnas
T02D3490:140a-19: pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings rdzogs pa'i byang
T02D3490:140a-20: chub la rab tu dgod cing drang ba'i phyir 'dir
T02D3490:140a-21: bdag bla na med pa yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang
T02D3490:140a-22: chub kyi lam la brten par bgyid de /
T02D3490:140a-24: de nas gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba'i tshigs bcad brjod par bya'o //
T02D3490:140a-25: de nas sems can thams cad la bde ba nye bar sdud par byed pa ni byams pa'o //
T02D3490:140a-26: sdug bsngal thams cad sel bar byed pa ni snying rje'o //
T02D3490:140a-27: mtho ris kyi bde ba rnam par sbyor ba nges par byed pa ni dga' ba'o //
T02D3490:140a-28: nyon mongs pa'i gnyen po'i phyogs kyi lam nye bar sdud pa'i btang snyoms rnams bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3490:140a-29: de nas chos thams cad la yid kyis dmigs te rnam par spyad par bya'o //
T02D3490:140a-30: bsam pa de bzhin du 'dir de dang de'i rnam
T02D3490:140a-31: pas 'khrul pa rnams so sor bsal te dper na
T02D3490:140a-32: rmi lam gyi sems las phyi ru yod pa lta
T02D3490:140a-33: bu'o // sems kyi phyi rol du gzung ba rang
T02D3490:140a-34: bzhin med pas 'dzin pa'i sems kyang rang bzhin med
T02D3490:140a-35: bu'o // par 'gyur ro // de la sems dang
T02D3490:140a-36: lus kyi chos thams cad de rnams kyis gzung ba
T02D3490:140a-37: dang 'dzin pa stong pa nyid kyis don dam pa
T02D3490:140a-38: bu'o // par 'gyur ro // zhes bya'o // de
T02D3490:140a-39: bzhin du gcig gi mtha' yas nges pa dang 'khrul
T02D3490:140a-40: pa yang dag par skye ba 'khrul pa'i rtags chos
T02D3490:140b-0: thams cad @140b kyi rnam par spong ba de rnams
T02D3490:140b-1: kyi rang bzhin de bzhin nyid 'ba' zhig pa gnyis
T02D3490:140b-2: su med pa dag cing mtshan nyid shel dag pa
T02D3490:140b-3: lta bu ston ka'i dri ma med pa'i nyin gung
T02D3490:140b-4: gi nam mkha' lta bu mtha' yas pa blta bar
T02D3490:140b-5: bu'o // par 'gyur ro // zhes bya'o // bya'o
T02D3490:140b-6: // 'dir 'jig rten las 'das pa'i stong pa nyid
T02D3490:140b-7: kyi ye shes spros pa dang bral ba rnam par
T02D3490:140b-9: de nas de'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02D3490:140b-10: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham /
T02D3490:140b-11: bsnyen pa ni bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi
T02D3490:140b-12: pha rol tu phyin ma bsnyen pa'i cho ga bsrung
T02D3490:140b-13: bar bya'o // de nas de'i mi 'jigs par 'gyur
T02D3490:140b-14: pa'i rnam pa dang ldan pa bsrung shing dag pa
T02D3490:140b-15: 'jig rten pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin bsgom par
T02D3490:140b-16: bar bya'o // bya'o // de nas ra yig las ni nyi ma bdun du bsgom //
T02D3490:140b-17: nyi mar h'um yig las byung sna tshogs rdor //
T02D3490:140b-18: de yis de bzhin rdo rje rnam bsgoms nas //
T02D3490:140b-19: ra ba dang ni gur yang bcing bar bya //
T02D3490:140b-20: sna tshogs rdo rje'i 'od kyis bskal pa'i me ltar
T02D3490:140b-21: bzod par dka' bas thams cad du 'phro zhing mkhregs
T02D3490:140b-23: 'phreng du gru bzhi pa 'bar bzhin pa'i rdo rje'i ra ba'o //
T02D3490:140b-24: steng du rdo rje'i gur ro //
T02D3490:140b-25: 'og tu rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyis gzhis ro gdan
T02D3490:140b-26: gyi 'og kun du rnam par spras par blta bar
T02D3490:140b-27: bya'o // de nas nyi ma dang sna tshogs rdo
T02D3490:140b-28: rje dag las 'od zer byung nas phyogs su 'phro
T02D3490:140b-29: zhing mkhregs par gyur pas phyi ru sgo'i mtshams bcing
T02D3490:140b-30: par bya'o zhes pa ni tshigs su bcad pa'i don
T02D3490:140b-31: bya'o // to // de'i dbus su nam mkhar 'byung
T02D3490:140b-32: ba chen po'i rang bzhin chos 'byung zhes bshad pa
T02D3490:140b-33: rdo rje chen po 'dzin pa'i rang bzhin ston ka'i
T02D3490:140b-34: zla ba ltar dkar ba smad phra zhing steng yangs
T02D3490:140b-35: pa zur gsum pa nam mkha'i rang bzhin no //
T02D3490:140b-36: de'i dbus su sna tshogs chu skyes kyi ze'u 'brul la gnas pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje chen po'o //
T02D3490:140b-37: de'i stegs bu la 'byung ba chen po bzhi las
T02D3490:140b-38: grub pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam pa bzhi po lha
T02D3490:140b-39: mo bzhi'i rang bzhin rnams ni steng du yongs su
T02D3490:140b-40: blta bar bya'o // de la dang po yam yig
T02D3490:140b-41: las rlung gzhu'i rnam pa nag po du ba'i mdog
T02D3490:140b-42: lta bu rtse mo gnyis la g-yo ba'i dan gyis
T02D3490:140b-43: blta bar bya'o // brgyan pa'o // de nas ram
T02D3490:140b-44: yig las me gru gsum dmar; po zur rnams ram
T02D3490:140b-46: de nas bam yig las chu dkar po zlum po bum pas mtshan pa'o //
T02D3490:140b-47: de nas lam yig las dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor
T02D3490:141a-0: gru bzhi ser po zur rnams su rdo rje @141a
T02D3490:141a-2: de'i steng du bh'um yig las skyes pa'i 'khor lo'o //
T02D3490:141a-3: dang po ni de las ngo bo nyid kyi lha
T02D3490:141a-4: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes nyid kyis khyab
T02D3490:141a-5: cing gnas pa / de nas sna tshogs rdo rje'o //
T02D3490:141a-6: stegs bu'i dbus su 'byung ba chen po bzhi yongs
T02D3490:141a-7: su gyur pa las skyes pa yongs su dag pa'i
T02D3490:141a-8: sangs rgyas kyi zhing bsdus pa'i gzugs thar pa'i grong
T02D3490:141a-9: khyer chen po rnam par snang mdzad kyi rang bzhin
T02D3490:141a-10: rin po che sna tshogs pa'i rang bzhin gyi gzhal
T02D3490:141a-11: yas khang gru bzhi sgo bzhi pa /
T02D3490:141a-12: ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes pa'i /
T02D3490:141a-13: stegs bu bzhis yongs su bskor ba /
T02D3490:141a-18: me tog gi phreng ba dang /
T02D3490:141a-22: rdo rje'i srad bu las 'phros pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
T02D3490:141a-23: tshogs kyi 'od zer gyis sems g-yo ba'i ba dan
T02D3490:141a-24: gyi rtse mo la dril bu'i sgra sna tshogs phyogs
T02D3490:141a-26: lha mo mchog gis 'dod pa lnga po nye bar 'bul bas mnyes par mdzad pa'o //
T02D3490:141a-28: ge sar dang bcas pa bsgom par bya ba gcig pa dang /
T02D3490:141a-29: gzhan ni zur gsum pa dran par bya'o //
T02D3490:141a-30: de'i dbus su yon tan nyis 'gyur a'a li yongs su gyur pa las zla ba'o //
T02D3490:141a-31: de'i steng du t'i yig yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje'o //
T02D3490:141a-32: de'i lte ba la t'am yig go //
T02D3490:141a-33: de nas yang yon tan nyis 'gyur da dha da
T02D3490:141a-34: dha ya la dang ldan pa'i yon tan nyis 'gyur
T02D3490:141a-35: k'a li yongs su gyur pa las nyi ma'o //
T02D3490:141a-36: gnyis po sbyor ba ni bde ba chen po'i mchog
T02D3490:141a-37: tu dga' ba me long lta bu'i ye shes dang
T02D3490:141a-39: mnyam pa nyid dang ldan pa'i nyi ma dang /
T02D3490:141a-40: sa bon gyi rtags las rang gi lha ni so sor rtog pa zhes brjod do //
T02D3490:141a-41: bya ba thams cad gcig tu grub cing rdzogs pa dang /
T02D3490:141a-42: dag pa'i chos nyid do zhes pa ni rnam pa lngas mngon par byang chub pa'o //
T02D3490:141a-43: de'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis ye shes sems
T02D3490:141a-44: dpa' rnams bkug nas rang gi 'dod lha'i 'khor lo
T02D3490:141a-45: la de bzhin du gzhug cing /
T02D3490:141a-46: yang rnal 'byor pas mtshan ma dang sa bon yongs
T02D3490:141a-47: su gyur pa las lha mo sgrol ma rnam par
T02D3490:141a-49: phyag brgyad pa dang zhal bzhi ma //
T02D3490:141a-50: rgyan thams cad kyis kun nas brgyan //
T02D3490:141a-51: gser gyi mdog can gzhon nu ma'i //
T02D3490:141a-52: mtshan nyid dang ldan gzi brjid 'bar //
T02D3490:141a-53: sangs rgyas bzhi yi cod pan can //
T02D3490:141b-0: rdo rje @141b nyi mas dbang bskur skyes //
T02D3490:141b-1: na tshod gzhon zhing mdzes ldan ma //
T02D3490:141b-2: gser gyi rna cha g-yo ba can //
T02D3490:141b-3: sna tshogs padma'i gdan la bzhugs //
T02D3490:141b-4: 'od zer dmar pos rnam par brgyan //
T02D3490:141b-5: rdo rje zhags pa de bzhin dung //
T02D3490:141b-6: mda' bstod pa ni g-yas kyi phyag / rdo rje lcags kyu autpal dang //
T02D3490:141b-7: gzhu dang sdigs mdzub de bzhin g-yon ;
T02D3490:141b-8: / rdo rje sgrol bdag rnal 'byor pas //
T02D3490:141b-9: sems can kun don pha rol phyin //
T02D3490:141b-10: rdo rje skyil krung sbyor ba yis //
T02D3490:141b-11: sa gsum po ni bsgrub par bya //
T02D3490:141b-12: shar du me tog sgrol ma ste //
T02D3490:141b-13: sku mdog dkar mo yid 'ong ma //
T02D3490:141b-14: aom yig ye shes rdzogs pa yi //
T02D3490:141b-15: me tog phreng ba phyag na bsnams //
T02D3490:141b-16: zhal gcig pa dang phyag gnyis ma //
T02D3490:141b-17: rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan //
T02D3490:141b-18: lho ru bdug spos sgrol ma ni //
T02D3490:141b-19: sku mdog nag mo gzugs mdzes ma //
T02D3490:141b-20: rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan //
T02D3490:141b-21: phyag na spos kyi sdong po bsnams //
T02D3490:141b-22: nub tu mar me'i sgrol ma ni //
T02D3490:141b-23: mar me'i sdong bu phyag na bsnams //
T02D3490:141b-24: sku mdog ser mo rgyan chen ma ;
T02D3490:141b-25: / gser gyi rna cha g-yo ba can //
T02D3490:141b-26: byang du dri yi sgrol ma ni //
T02D3490:141b-27: dri yi dung chos phyag na bsnams //
T02D3490:141b-28: lha mo sku mdog dmar mo brjid //
T02D3490:141b-29: dkyil 'khor pa kun bsgom par bya //
T02D3490:141b-30: lcags kyu la sogs dbye ba yis //
T02D3490:141b-31: de nas sgo skyong ma rnams bsgom //
T02D3490:141b-32: phyag g-yas na ni lcags kyu dang //
T02D3490:141b-33: g-yon pa bdud la sdigs mdzub mdzad //
T02D3490:141b-34: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa'i //
T02D3490:141b-35: sku mdog dkar mo yid 'ong ma //
T02D3490:141b-37: phyag g-yas na ni zhags pa dang //
T02D3490:141b-38: g-yon pa gdug la sdig mdzub mdzad //
T02D3490:141b-39: dkyil 'khor dmar po'i dbus gnas pa'i //
T02D3490:141b-40: sku mdog dkar mo yid 'ong ma //
T02D3490:141b-42: / phyag g-yas na ni lcags sgrog bsnams //
T02D3490:141b-43: g-yon gyi phyag ni sdigs mdzub mdzad //
T02D3490:141b-44: rdo rje skyil krung dbus gnas pa'i //
T02D3490:141b-45: sku mdog dmar mo bsgom par bya //
T02D3490:141b-47: rdo rje dril bu phyag na bsnams //
T02D3490:141b-48: g-yon pa gdug la sdigs mdzub mdzad //
T02D3490:141b-50: mar gad dang mtshungs autpal bsnams //
T02D3490:141b-52: zur cha rnams kyi mtshan ma ni //
T02D3490:141b-53: byang sems bum pa ri rab dang //
T02D3490:141b-54: me thab dang ni rgyal mtshan che //
T02D3490:141b-55: steng du gtsug tor rnam rgyal ma //
T02D3490:141b-56: sku mdog dkar mo gzugs mjes ma //
T02D3490:141b-57: phyag g-yas na ni 'khor lo dang//
T02D3490:142a-0: @142a * // g-yon pa gdug la sdigs mdzub mdzad //
T02D3490:142a-1: phyag g-yas sbrul gyi zhags pa dang //
T02D3490:142a-2: g-yon pa gdug la sdigs mdzub mdzad //
T02D3490:142a-3: sku mdog nag mo 'jigs chen mo //
T02D3490:142a-4: 'og tu gnod mdzes ma bsgom bya //
T02D3490:142a-5: de ltar bsgom zhing sngags spros nas bzlas par bya'o //
T02D3490:142a-6: aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re sv'a h'a ;
T02D3490:142a-7: / yi ge bcu yis lha mo bcu //
T02D3490:142a-8: pha rol phyin pa bcu la brten //
T02D3490:142a-9: bsgom pa rab tu sbyor ba yis //
T02D3490:142a-10: las kun rab tu grub par byed //
T02D3490:142a-11: gti mug rdo rje mig la dgod //
T02D3490:142a-12: zhe sdang rdo rje rna ba dag / ser sna rdo rje de bzhin sna //
T02D3490:142a-13: zhal la 'dod chags rdo rje ma //
T02D3490:142a-14: lus la phrag dog rdo rje ma //
T02D3490:142a-15: nyon mongs mun pa kun 'joms pa'i //
T02D3490:142a-16: skye mched rnams su shes par bya //
T02D3490:142a-17: snying gar bdag med rnal 'byor ma //
T02D3490:142a-18: zhes pa ni mig la sogs pa byin gyis brlab pa'o //
T02D3490:142a-19: zhal gcig ma dang phyag gnyis ma //
T02D3490:142a-20: sna tshogs gzugs rnams g-yo ba yis //
T02D3490:142a-21: gri gug thod pa phyag na bsnams //
T02D3490:142a-22: srog ni steng du yang dag gnas /
T02D3490:142a-23: de nas lus ngag yid gsum byin gyis brlab pa ni /
T02D3490:142a-24: aom yig sku yi rdo rje yis //
T02D3490:142a-25: rgyal po chen po rnam par brgyan //
T02D3490:142a-26: h'um yig thugs kyi rdo rje yis //
T02D3490:142a-27: rgyal chen rdor sems go 'phang gnas //
T02D3490:142a-28: a'a:yig mchog gi de nyid dag / ji ltar rnam snang mdzad par 'dod //
T02D3490:142a-29: kun la de bzhin yum gyur pa'i //
T02D3490:142a-30: ye shes rang bzhin thugs kar dgod //
T02D3490:142a-31: sems dpa' ye shes sbyor ba yis //
T02D3490:142a-32: sangs rgyas byang chub thob par 'gyur //
T02D3490:142a-33: rang sngags yi ge las byung ba'i //
T02D3490:142a-34: phyag rgya'i 'khor lo brtag pa yis //
T02D3490:142a-36: spro dang bsdu ba byas nas ni //
T02D3490:142a-37: nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus gnas pa'i //
T02D3490:142a-38: ye shes dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya //
T02D3490:142a-39: ye shes lnga yi yon tan grags //
T02D3490:142a-40: sna tshogs gzugs dang ldan pa yi //
T02D3490:142a-41: mchod pa kun gyis mchod pa dang //
T02D3490:142a-42: mngon par bstod pas mchod par bya //
T02D3490:142a-43: sgo skyong ma rnams rab sbyor bas //
T02D3490:142a-44: ye shes chu bo rab tu bsgrubs //
T02D3490:142a-45: dam tshig 'khor lor yang dag zhugs //
T02D3490:142a-47: sangs rgyas kun mtshungs rnal 'byor pas //
T02D3490:142a-48: gnyis med gyur par skad cig la //
T02D3490:142a-49: aom badzr'am ku shi a'a karsha ya dza: aom badzra p'a shi pra be sha ya h'um /
T02D3490:142a-50: aom badzra spho ti bandha ya bam /
T02D3490:142a-51: aom badzr'a be sha ba shr'i kum ru ho: rang
T02D3490:142a-52: gi snying ga'i sa bon las byung ba'i 'od zer
T02D3490:142b-0: lcags @142b kyu'i rnam pas khams gsum na bzhugs pa'i
T02D3490:142b-1: sangs rgyas rnams gdan drangs pa tsam gyis yang dag
T02D3490:142b-2: par mchod nas rjes su mgon du byed pas /
T02D3490:142b-3: aom aa bhi shinytsantu m'am sar ba ta th'a ga ta /
T02D3490:142b-4: byang chub rdo rje sangs rgyas la //
T02D3490:142b-5: ji ltar mchod chen stsal ba ltar //
T02D3490:142b-6: bdag kyang bskyab pa'i don gyi phyir //
T02D3490:142b-7: nam mkha'i rdo rje deng bdag stsol //
T02D3490:142b-8: zhes pas dbang bskur ba zhu'o //
T02D3490:142b-9: dbang bskur ba ni rdo rje che //
T02D3490:142b-10: khams gsum pa yis phyag byas pa //
T02D3490:142b-11: sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba gsum //
T02D3490:142b-12: gnas gyur bdag la stsal du gsol //
T02D3490:142b-13: zhes brjod nas sangs rgyas he ru ka'i gzugs kyis
T02D3490:142b-14: bdud rtsi ldas gang ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i
T02D3490:142b-15: bdag nyid kyi bum pa lngas dbang bskur te /
T02D3490:142b-16: dbang bskur ba'i dus su me tog gi char 'bab bar 'gyur ro //
T02D3490:142b-17: rnga bo che'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T02D3490:142b-18: gur gum gyi char 'bab par 'gyur ro //
T02D3490:142b-19: gzugs rdo rje ma la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod pa byed par 'gyur ro //
T02D3490:142b-20: spyan ma la sogs pa rnams kyis rdo rje'i glu dang bstod pa byed par 'gyur ro //
T02D3490:142b-21: dbang bskur ba dang ldan pa'i spyi bor rdo rje nyi mas dbu brgyan te /
T02D3490:142b-22: cod pan gyi phyogs rnams su de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad dang /
T02D3490:142b-25: don yod grub pa rnams so //
T02D3490:142b-26: dbus kyi 'khor lo'i rim pa ji lta ba bzhin
T02D3490:142b-27: du lha mo bzhi po rnams kyi cod pan can
T02D3490:142b-28: no // sgo skyong ma rnams kyi yang ste /
T02D3490:142b-29: gtsug tor du rin chen dbang po dang /
T02D3490:142b-30: gnod mdzes ma la mi bskyod pa'i cod pan no //
T02D3490:142b-31: zhe sdang rdo rje khyod la 'dud //
T02D3490:142b-33: ser sna rdo rje bdag skrag pas //
T02D3490:142b-34: 'dod chags rdo rje bdag la stsol //
T02D3490:142b-35: nga rgyal chen po phrag dog che //
T02D3490:142b-36: rdo rje thams cad bdag la stsol //
T02D3490:142b-37: rdo rje thams cad dam tshig mgon //
T02D3490:142b-38: las rnams thams cad rab tu sgrub //
T02D3490:142b-40: lha yi me tog dam pa 'di //
T02D3490:142b-41: gtsang zhing dag pa'i skye gnas te //
T02D3490:142b-42: bdag gis gus pas nges par 'bul//
T02D3490:142b-43: so sor bzhes nas bdag la skyobs //
T02D3490:142b-45: nags kyi ro sogs yid 'ong ba //
T02D3490:142b-46: dri la sogs pa'i bdug spos mchog / bdag gis gus pas nges par 'bul //
T02D3490:142b-47: so sor bzhes nas bdag la skyobs //
T02D3490:142b-49: bsrung pa'i tshogs dang dag pa dang //
T02D3490:143a-2: bdag gis gus pas nges par 'bul //
T02D3490:143a-3: so sor bzhes nas bdag la skyobs //
T02D3490:143a-5: lha yi dri mchog dam pa 'di //
T02D3490:143a-6: gtsang zhing dag pa'i skye gnas te //
T02D3490:143a-7: bdag gis gus pas nges par 'bul //
T02D3490:143a-8: so sor bzhes nas bdag la skyobs //
T02D3490:143a-10: de'i rjes su yam yig yongs su gyur pa las
T02D3490:143a-11: rlung gi dkyil 'khor gzhu'i rnam pa rgyal mtshan gyis
T02D3490:143a-12: mtshan pa'o // ram yig dmar po'i sa bon las
T02D3490:143a-13: byung ba'i me'i dkyil 'khor zur gsum gyi steng du
T02D3490:143a-14: aa yi ga dmar po las byung ba'i padma'i snod
T02D3490:143a-15: bhr'um a'am dzr'im kham h'um gi sa bon yongs su
T02D3490:143a-16: gyur pa las de'i sa bon byin gyis brlabs nas
T02D3490:143a-17: mtshan pa'o // dri dang / nyi ma dang zla ba dang /
T02D3490:143a-19: chu'i mtshan nyid grangs ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D3490:143a-20: lnga'i rang bzhin bdud rtsi lnga go ku da ha
T02D3490:143a-21: na zhes pa'i sa bon lnga bsams nas /
T02D3490:143a-22: de'i steng du mtho gang tsam 'phags pa'i zla ba
T02D3490:143a-23: la gnas pa'i h'um yig las byung ba'i rdo rje
T02D3490:143a-24: chen po rtse lnga pa bsgoms nas /
T02D3490:143a-25: de'i 'og tu aom yig bsams nas rlung gis bskyod pa'i me'i dkyil 'khor /
T02D3490:143a-26: me'i steng du rdo rje'i me /
T02D3490:143a-27: de thams cad sdud par bltas nas de'i reg byas
T02D3490:143a-28: aom yig dang rdo rje zhu nas de la de
T02D3490:143a-29: bzhin du bdud rtsi dang mar zhu ba bzhin du
T02D3490:143a-30: ro gcig tu gyur par bsams nas /
T02D3490:143a-31: de'i steng du t'am yig dkar po'i 'od zer gyis
T02D3490:143a-32: khams gsum gyi nang du zhugs nas bdud rtsi thams
T02D3490:143a-33: cad bkug ste / de'i nang du byas pas chos
T02D3490:143a-34: kyi dbyings dang mtshungs pa des de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D3490:143a-35: thams cad kyi thugs la zhugs shing ye shes kyi
T02D3490:143a-36: bdud rtsi bkug nas da bzhin du lhan cig tu
T02D3490:143a-37: cad bkug ste / byas te / de'i steng du
T02D3490:143a-38: de nyid gsum bsams nas des de bzhin du mngon
T02D3490:143a-39: cad bkug ste / byas te / par bsngags te
T02D3490:143a-40: / dkyil 'khor pa thams cad kyi thugs kar dkyil
T02D3490:143a-41: 'khor gyi 'khor lo bsams nas ljags rnams la h'um
T02D3490:143a-42: yig dkar po las skyes pa'i rdo rje dkar po
T02D3490:143a-43: nas 'bru'i tshad tsam bsams nas de'i bdud rtsis dkyil
T02D3490:143a-44: 'khor ba'i bdag nyid kyang mnyes par bya'o //
T02D3490:143a-45: 'dis dkyil 'khor rdzogs nas thun mtshams gsum du bsgoms nas ldang bar bya'o //
T02D3490:143a-46: rtag tu lha'i gzugs kyis gnas par bya'o //
T02D3490:143a-47: de la bzlas pa'i sngags ni 'di'o //
T02D3490:143a-48: aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re sv'a h'a //
T02D3490:143a-49: sngags mchog 'di ni gtso bo ste //
T02D3490:143b-0: sangs rgyas kun gyis phyag byas @143b pa ;
T02D3490:143b-1: bklags pas dngos grub myur du byed //
T02D3490:143b-2: rdo rje gur las gsal por gsungs //
T02D3490:143b-3: de nas gzhan yang gzungs kyi sngags ni /
T02D3490:143b-4: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
T02D3490:143b-5: nam a'ary'a wa lo ki te shva r'a ya /
T02D3490:143b-8: ma h'a k'a ru ni k'a ya tadya th'a /
T02D3490:143b-9: aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re sarba dusht'an ma ma kri te dzam bha ya /
T02D3490:143b-12: bandha ya h'um h'um h'um phat phat phat sarba dusht'an stambha ni t'a re sv'a h'a /
T02D3490:143b-13: yi ge bcu'i cho ga'i sngags 'di gos kyi sna
T02D3490:143b-14: la lan bdun du mngon par bsngags nas mdud pa
T02D3490:143b-15: byas na // 'jigs pa dang bcas pa'i sa gang du 'gro yang 'jigs par mi 'gyur ro //
T02D3490:143b-23: dred la sogs pa ming dran pa tsam gyis zhi zhing 'jigs par mi 'gyur ro //
T02D3490:143b-24: sngags 'dis autpal la'i sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad byas te /
T02D3490:143b-25: aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re aa mu kam me ba sa ma na ya sv'a h'a /
T02D3490:143b-26: yang sngags des de bzhin du bya rog gi sgrol
T02D3490:143b-27: la lan sum cu rtsa gnyis yongs su bzlas te
T02D3490:143b-28: dgra'i khyim du sbas na zhag bdun na skrod par
T02D3490:143b-29: 'gyur ro // aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re
T02D3490:143b-30: tsa la pra tsa la sh'i ghram g'a mi ni
T02D3490:143b-31: de ba datta autstsha ta ya h'um phat /
T02D3490:143b-32: de nas gzhan la yang rab tu sbyor bar 'gyur te /
T02D3490:143b-33: aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re aa mu k'a
T02D3490:143b-34: bhi dh'a n'am ku m'a r'i ma hy'a mud b'a
T02D3490:143b-35: he na ta sy'a:pi t'a pra yatstshantu sv'a h'a /
T02D3490:143b-36: myos byed gtum po'i sa bon dang //
T02D3490:143b-37: myos byed 'bras bu de bzhin du //
T02D3490:143b-38: mya ngan med shing me tog bcas //
T02D3490:143b-39: sbyin sreg stong phrag lnga byas te //
T02D3490:143b-40: mar sbrang bu ram sbyin sreg ni //
T02D3490:143b-41: bu mo sgrub la mchog tu bsngags //
T02D3490:143b-42: de nas zhag bdun sbyor ba yis //
T02D3490:143b-44: de nas gzhan la yang rab tu sbyor bar 'gyur te ;
T02D3490:143b-45: aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re aa mu k'a
T02D3490:143b-46: bh'i dha n'am svasth'a na ta a'a karsha ya ma
T02D3490:143b-47: m'a nti ke dza:sngags 'dis rag chung gi tsher ma
T02D3490:143b-48: rang byung gi me tog la bsnyugs te sbyin sreg
T02D3490:143b-49: stong phrag lnga byas na 'dis rgyal po'i bu mo
T02D3490:143b-51: de nas gzhan la yang rab tu sbyor bar 'gyur te /
T02D3490:143b-52: rang byung gi me tog gis bskus pa'i ras la
T02D3490:143b-53: bcom ldan 'das ma zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma lcags
T02D3490:143b-54: kyu dang autpal la'i zhags pa phyag na bsnams pa
T02D3490:143b-55: bris la de'i mdun du mchod pa byas nas /
T02D3490:143b-56: lha yi me tog dam pa 'di //
T02D3490:143b-57: zhes pa la sogs pas mchod par bya'o //
T02D3490:143b-58: phyis bsgom pa dang ldan pas sngags bzlas par bya'o //
T02D3490:144a-0: aom t'a re tutt'a re tu @144a * //
T02D3490:144a-1: re aa mu ki ma me ba si tam sva snam ka th'a ya h'um phat /
T02D3490:144a-3: zhags pas mgul pa bcings shing lcags kyus snying gar
T02D3490:144a-4: phug la bkug nas bsgrub bya rkang pa'i 'og tu
T02D3490:144a-5: bsams la bran mo'i tshul gyis spyad par bya'o //
T02D3490:144a-6: de nas gzhan la yang rab tu sbyor bar 'gyur te ;
T02D3490:144a-7: sgrol ma'i gzungs lan bdun du mngon par bsngags nas
T02D3490:144a-8: bdag gi mig gnyis la byugs nas rgyal rigs kyi
T02D3490:144a-9: nang du zhugs na rgyal po dang bcas pa slob
T02D3490:144a-10: mar 'gyur zhing gus par byed do //
T02D3490:144a-13: dga' ba'i gtam byed par 'gyur ro //
T02D3490:144a-15: khro ba yang dbang du 'gyur ro //
T02D3490:144a-16: mthong ba'i rkyen gyis ngo mtshar du 'gyur ro //
T02D3490:144a-17: de nas gzhan la yang rab tu sbyor bar 'gyur te /
T02D3490:144a-18: sgrol ma'i gzungs lan brgya bzlas nas sbrul mgo gnyis
T02D3490:144a-19: pa'i mgo thal bar byas te ba dmar mo'i mar
T02D3490:144a-20: la aarka'i bal la sdong bu byas te rab tu
T02D3490:144a-21: sbar nas mig sman byas te /
T02D3490:144a-23: rdo rje nyi ma dang rdo rje chos dag la mnyes shing rta mchog gis bdug par bya'o //
T02D3490:144a-24: thal ba dang lhan cig mig sman byas gang la
T02D3490:144a-25: rdo rje'i mig gis bltas pa de'i gal te padma
T02D3490:144a-26: gar dbang 'dzag par ma gyur na /
T02D3490:144a-27: de'i tshe sgrol ma bdag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bslus par 'gyur ro //
T02D3490:144a-28: de nas gzhan la yang rab tu sbyor bar 'gyur te /
T02D3490:144a-29: byis pa so ma skyes pa'i kha chu blangs nas
T02D3490:144a-30: sgrol ma'i gzungs lan bdun du mngon bar bsngags te
T02D3490:144a-31: / bhring+ga r'a dza'i rtsa ba dang gi'u wang dang
T02D3490:144a-32: lhan cig tu byas te dpral bar thig le byas
T02D3490:144a-33: nas gang dang gang la bltas pa de dang de
T02D3490:144a-35: de nas gzhan la yang rab tu sbyor bar 'gyur te /
T02D3490:144a-36: lto ba'i srin bu la sgrol ma'i gzungs lan bdun
T02D3490:144a-37: du mngon par bsngags nas rdo rje chos dang bcas
T02D3490:144a-38: te so rtsi gzhon nu ma la byin na longs
T02D3490:144a-39: spyad pa tsam gyis sbyor ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro
T02D3490:144a-40: // 'di mi spong zhing gzhan la dga' bar mi 'gyur ro //
T02D3490:144a-41: gzhan du mi 'gro la skyes bu gzhan mi 'dod do //
T02D3490:144a-42: rang gi bdag po yang spong bar mi byed do //
T02D3490:144a-43: de nas gzhan la yang rab tu sbyor bar 'gyur te /
T02D3490:144a-44: zhag chen po bdag nyid kyi lus la byugs te /
T02D3490:144a-45: sgrol ma'i gzungs khri phrag gcig bzlas shing bsgoms te /
T02D3490:144b-0: @144b bzlas pa'i mtha' la 'bras s'a lu'i phye mas
T02D3490:144b-1: dril phyis byas ba'i dri ma bsdus te gang la
T02D3490:144b-2: byin pa de ji srid 'tsho'i bar du gtong bar
T02D3490:144b-3: mi 'gyur ro // de nas gzhan la yang rab tu sbyor bar 'gyur te /
T02D3490:144b-4: zla ba gzas zin pa'i dus su sgrol ma'i gzungs
T02D3490:144b-5: bzlas shing bsnyen pa byas nas de las yang dag
T02D3490:144b-6: par byung ba'i 'jig rten dbang phyug blangs te dung
T02D3490:144b-7: gi phye ma dang bsre bar bya'o //
T02D3490:144b-8: de nas sgeg mo la byin na de ji srid 'tsho'i bar du rjes su 'jug par 'gyur ro //
T02D3490:144b-9: de la de bzhin du bdag por 'dod cing gzhan du mi 'gro'o //
T02D3490:144b-10: de nas gzhan la yang rab tu sbyor bar 'gyur te /
T02D3490:144b-11: sgrol ma'i gzungs sngags kyis myos byed kyi 'bras bu
T02D3490:144b-12: la lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas te myos
T02D3490:144b-13: byed kyi 'bras bu dang rta mgrin lhan cig tu
T02D3490:144b-14: mnyes la byugs na de dbang du 'gyur ro //
T02D3490:144b-15: de nas gzhan la yang rab tu sbyor bar 'gyur te /
T02D3490:144b-16: aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re aa mu k'a sya bandha na mukti kum ru sv'ah'a /
T02D3490:144b-17: zhes pa'i sngags 'dis aarka'i lo ma la bsgrub bya'i
T02D3490:144b-18: ming bar du bcug ste bris nas sdig pa'i tshang
T02D3490:144b-19: du sbas na de bcings pa las grol bar 'gyur
T02D3490:144b-20: ro // rdo rje sgrol ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs //
T02D3490:144b-21: yang dag bris las nyer bsags pa'i //
T02D3490:144b-23: bde gshegs gnas su 'jug par shog / rdo rje sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
T02D3490:144b-25: // / panti ta chen po rin chen 'byung gnas zhi ba'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa'o //
T02D3490:144b-26: lha mchod ka ra b'i ra'i me tog la //
T02D3490:144b-27: thun mtshams gsum du brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas //
T02D3490:144b-28: 'dod pa'i mchog nyid blang bya zla gcig gis //
T02D3490:144b-29: 'phags ma sgrol mas nges par stsol bar mdzad /
